ConfigurationOption.Value: select wo.wonum, wo.parent, wo.taskid, wo.description, wo.assetnum, wo.location, wo.status, sd.maxvalue maxstatus, wo.targstartdate, wo.targcompdate, (select to_char( dbms_lob.substr(ldtext,3999) ) from longdescription where ldkey = wo.workorderid and ldownertable = 'WORKORDER' and ldownercol = 'DESCRIPTION') ldtext, wo.siteid, wo.workorderid, p.workorderid parentid from workorder wo join workorder p on wo.parent = p.wonum and wo.siteid = p.siteid join synonymdomain sd on wo.status = sd.value and sd.domainid = 'WOSTATUS' where wo.istask = 1 and p.historyflag = 0

Struct._value: := test( ${Done}, localCount( 'Work Order Tasks', "Parent = ${Parent} and 'Work Order' != ${Work Order} and Status != 'COMP' " ), -1 )

EventAction.Condition: localCount( 'FAP Meter Readings', " Asset = ${Asset} and 'Meter Name' = ${TASK_DESC} and 'New Reading' is null " ) >= 1

ConfigurationOption.Value: Please complete the meter readings before completing the task

List.ListEntry: p.workorderid in ( select wo.workorderid from workorder wo left outer join lbl_labtrans lbl on lbl.refwo = wo.wonum left outer join jobplan jp on (wo.jpnum = jp.jpnum) where wo.orgid = 'LBNL' and wo.siteid = 'FAC' and wo.historyflag = 0 and wo.status not in ( 'CAN', 'CLOSE', 'HISTEDIT' ) and jp.lbl_classid='FAP'and lbl.laborcode = '${MX_LABOR_CODE}' and wo.istask = 0 )
